trans-unit.resname: PLTR·2s | The Battle of Bywater | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures with power 3 or greater. Then create a Food token for each creature you control. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·2s | The Battle of Bywater | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Tooks marched in with Pippin at their head. Merry now had enough sturdy Hobbitry to deal with the ruffians.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·4s | Boromir, Warden of the Tower | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Vigilance Whenever an opponent casts a spell, if no mana was spent to cast it, counter that spell. Sacrifice Boromir, Warden of the Tower: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. The Ring tempts you.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·4s | Boromir, Warden of the Tower | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Farewell, Aragorn! Go to Minas Tirith and save my people!"

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·5s | Dawn of a New Age | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Dawn of a New Age enters the battlefield with a hope counter on it for each creature you control. At the beginning of your end step, remove a hope counter from Dawn of a New Age. If you do, draw a card. Then if Dawn of a New Age has no hope counters on it, sacrifice it and you gain 4 life.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·15s | Flowering of the White Tree | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Legendary creatures you control get +2/+1 and have ward {1}. Nonlegendary creatures you control get +1/+1.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·15s | Flowering of the White Tree | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Aragorn planted the new tree in the court by the fountain, and swiftly and gladly it began to grow.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·17s | Forge Anew | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Forge Anew enters the battlefield, return target Equipment card from your graveyard to the battlefield. As long as it's your turn, you may activate equip abilities any time you could cast an instant. You may pay {0} rather than pay the equip cost of the first equip ability you activate during each of your turns.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·18s | Frodo, Sauron's Bane | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {W/B}{W/B}: If Frodo, Sauron's Bane is a Citizen, it becomes a Halfling Scout with base power and toughness 2/3 and lifelink. {B}{B}{B}: If Frodo is a Scout, it becomes a Halfling Rogue with "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game if the Ring has tempted you four or more times this game. Otherwise, the Ring tempts you."

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·19s | Gandalf the White | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flash You may cast legendary spells and artifact spells as though they had flash. If a legendary permanent or an artifact entering or leaving the battlefield causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·36s | War of the Last Alliance | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II — Search your library for a legendary creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. III — Creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn. The Ring tempts you.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·44s | Borne Upon a Wind | Card Text
trans-unit.source: You may cast spells this turn as though they had flash. Draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·44s | Borne Upon a Wind | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I looked on Aragorn and thought how great and terrible a Lord he might have become, had he taken the Ring for himself. Not for naught does Mordor fear him."\n—Legolas

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·52s | Goldberry, River-Daughter | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {T}: Move a counter of each kind not on Goldberry, River-Daughter from another target permanent you control onto Goldberry. {U}, {T}: Move one or more counters from Goldberry onto another target permanent you control. If you do, draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·52s | Goldberry, River-Daughter | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Fear nothing! For tonight you are under the roof of Tom Bombadil."

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·61s | Lost Isle Calling | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you scry, put a verse counter on Lost Isle Calling. {4}{U}{U}, Exile Lost Isle Calling: Draw a card for each verse counter on Lost Isle Calling. If it had seven or more verse counters on it, take an extra turn after this one. Activate only as a sorcery.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·61s | Lost Isle Calling | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "To the Sea, to the Sea!"

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·65s | Press the Enemy | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Return target spell or nonland permanent an opponent controls to its owner's hand. You may cast an instant or sorcery spell with equal or lesser mana value from your hand without paying its mana cost.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·65s | Press the Enemy | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I showed the blade reforged to him. He is not so mighty yet that he is above fear."

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·66s | Rangers of Ithilien | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Vigilance When Rangers of Ithilien enters the battlefield, gain control of up to one target creature with lesser power for as long as you control Rangers of Ithilien. Then the Ring tempts you.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·66s | Rangers of Ithilien | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We have a new errand on this journey: to ambush the Men of Harad."

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·69s | Scroll of Isildur | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Gain control of up to one target artifact for as long as you control Scroll of Isildur. The Ring tempts you. II — Tap up to two target creatures. Put a stun counter on each of them. III — Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·72s | Storm of Saruman | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Ward {3} Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, copy it, except the copy isn't legendary. You may choose new targets for the copy. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·72s | Storm of Saruman | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Isengard had once been filled with fruitful trees, but no green thing grew there in the latter days of Saruman.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·75s | The Watcher in the Water | Card Text
trans-unit.source: The Watcher in the Water enters the battlefield tapped with nine stun counters on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.) Whenever you draw a card during an opponent's turn, create a 1/1 blue Tentacle creature token. Whenever a Tentacle you control dies, untap up to one target Kraken and put a stun counter on up to one target nonland permanent.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·79s | Call of the Ring | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, the Ring tempts you. Whenever you choose a creature as your Ring-bearer, you may pay 2 life. If you do, draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·79s | Call of the Ring | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Ring is mine!"

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·91s | Isildur's Fateful Strike | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (You may cast a legendary instant only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.) Destroy target creature. If its controller has more than four cards in hand, they exile cards from their hand equal to the difference.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·91s | Isildur's Fateful Strike | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Isildur cut the Ring from Sauron's hand with the hilt-shard of his father's sword, and Sauron himself was overthrown.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·93s | Lobelia Sackville-Baggins | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flash Menace When Lobelia Sackville-Baggins enters the battlefield, exile target creature card from an opponent's graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn, then create X Treasure tokens, where X is the exiled card's power.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·102s | One Ring to Rule Them All | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — The Ring tempts you, then each player mills cards equal to your Ring-bearer's power. II — Destroy all nonlegendary creatures. III — Each opponent loses 1 life for each creature card in that player's graveyard.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·103s | Orcish Bowmasters | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flash When Orcish Bowmasters enters the battlefield and whenever an opponent draws a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, Orcish Bowmasters deals 1 damage to any target. Then amass Orcs 1.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·106s | Sauron, the Necromancer | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Menace Whenever Sauron, the Necromancer attacks, exile target creature card from your graveyard. Create a tapped and attacking token that's a copy of that card, except it's a 3/3 black Wraith with menace. At the beginning of the next end step, exile that token unless Sauron is your Ring-bearer.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·107s | Shadow of the Enemy | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Exile all creature cards from target player's graveyard. You may cast spells from among those cards for as long as they remain exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast them.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·107s | Shadow of the Enemy | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As Frodo put on the Ring, Sauron was suddenly aware of the magnitude of his own folly. His wrath blazed in consuming flame, but his fear rose like black smoke.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·114s | Witch-king of Angmar | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying Whenever one or more creatures deal combat damage to you, each opponent sacrifices a creature that dealt combat damage to you this turn. The Ring tempts you. Discard a card: Witch-king of Angmar gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·119s | Display of Power | Card Text
trans-unit.source: This spell can't be copied. Copy any number of target instant and/or sorcery spells. You may choose new targets for the copies.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·119s | Display of Power | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Nazgûl closed round at night, and I was besieged. Such light and flame cannot have been seen on Weathertop since the war-beacons of old."\n—Gandalf

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·120s | Éomer, Marshal of Rohan | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Haste Whenever one or more other attacking legendary creatures you control die, untap all creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase. This ability triggers only once each turn.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·120s | Éomer, Marshal of Rohan | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Need brooks no delay, yet late is better than never."

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·124s | Fall of Cair Andros | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature an opponent controls is dealt excess noncombat damage, amass Orcs X, where X is that excess damage. (Put X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also an Orc. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token first.) {7}{R}: Fall of Cair Andros deals 7 damage to target creature.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·132s | Glóin, Dwarf Emissary | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a historic spell, create a Treasure token. This ability triggers only once each turn. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.) {T}, Sacrifice a Treasure: Goad target creature. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·136s | Hew the Entwood | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice any number of lands. Reveal the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of lands sacrificed this way. Choose any number of artifact and/or land cards revealed this way. Put all nonland cards chosen this way onto the battlefield, then put all land cards chosen this way onto the battlefield tapped, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·138s | Moria Marauder | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Double strike Whenever a Goblin or Orc you control deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·138s | Moria Marauder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There was a rush of hoarse laughter, like the fall of sliding stones into a pit; amid the clamor a deep voice was raised in command.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·149s | Spiteful Banditry | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Spiteful Banditry enters the battlefield, it deals X damage to each creature. Whenever one or more creatures your opponents control die, you create a Treasure token. This ability triggers only once each turn.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·149s | Spiteful Banditry | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "One ill turn deserves another."\n—Saruman

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·151s | There and Back Again | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Up to one target creature can't block for as long as you control There and Back Again. The Ring tempts you. II — Search your library for a Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. III — Create Smaug, a legendary 6/6 red Dragon creature token with flying, haste, and "When this creature dies, create fourteen Treasure tokens."

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·158s | Delighted Halfling | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a legendary spell, and that spell can't be countered.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·158s | Delighted Halfling | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There were toys the Hobbit-children had never seen before, all beautiful, and some obviously magical.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·160s | Elven Chorus | Card Text
trans-unit.source: You may look at the top card of your library any time. You may cast creature spells from the top of your library. Creatures you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·160s | Elven Chorus | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "A Elbereth Gilthoniel, silivren penna míriel o menel aglar elenath!"

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·165s | Fall of Gil-galad | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Scry 2. II — Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. III — Until end of turn, target creature you control gains "When this creature dies, draw two cards." Then that creature fights up to one other target creature.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·166s | Fangorn, Tree Shepherd | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Treefolk you control have vigilance. Whenever one or more Treefolk you control attack, add twice that much {G}. You don't lose unspent green mana as steps and phases end.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·166s | Fangorn, Tree Shepherd | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I am an Ent. Fangorn is my name according to some, Treebeard others make it."

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·172s | Last March of the Ents | Card Text
trans-unit.source: This spell can't be countered. Draw cards equal to the greatest toughness among creatures you control, then put any number of creature cards from your hand onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·172s | Last March of the Ents | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "To Isengard with doom we come!\nWith doom we come, with doom we come!"

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·173s | Legolas, Master Archer | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Reach Whenever you cast a spell that targets Legolas, Master Archer, put a +1/+1 counter on Legolas. Whenever you cast a spell that targets a creature you don't control, Legolas deals damage equal to its power to up to one target creature.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·184s | Radagast the Brown | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever Radagast the Brown or another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is that creature's mana value. You may reveal a creature card that doesn't share a creature type with a creature you control from among those cards and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·186s | The Ring Goes South | Card Text
trans-unit.source: The Ring tempts you. Then reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal X land cards, where X is the number of legendary creatures you control. Put those land cards onto the battlefield tapped and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·191s | Aragorn, Company Leader | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever the Ring tempts you, if you chose a creature other than Aragorn, Company Leader as your Ring-bearer, put your choice of a counter from among first strike, vigilance, deathtouch, and lifelink on Aragorn. Whenever you put one or more counters on Aragorn, put one of each of those kinds of counters on up to one other target creature.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·192s | Aragorn, the Uniter | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a white spell, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token. Whenever you cast a blue spell, scry 2. Whenever you cast a red spell, Aragorn, the Uniter deals 3 damage to target opponent. Whenever you cast a green spell, target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·193s | Arwen, Mortal Queen | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Arwen, Mortal Queen enters the battlefield with an indestructible counter on it. {1}, Remove an indestructible counter from Arwen: Another target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter and a lifelink counter on that creature and a +1/+1 counter and a lifelink counter on Arwen.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·195s | The Balrog, Durin's Bane | Card Text
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each permanent sacrificed this turn. Haste The Balrog, Durin's Bane can't be blocked except by legendary creatures. When The Balrog dies, destroy target artifact or creature an opponent controls.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·199s | Doors of Durin | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you attack, scry 2, then you may reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. Until your next turn, it gains trample if you control a Dwarf and hexproof if you control an Elf.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·199s | Doors of Durin | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Speak, friend, and enter."

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·200s | Elrond, Master of Healing | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you scry, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to X target creatures, where X is the number of cards looked at while scrying this way. Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·201s | Éowyn, Fearless Knight | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Haste When Éowyn, Fearless Knight enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls with greater power. Legendary creatures you control gain protection from each of that creature's colors until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·201s | Éowyn, Fearless Knight | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Am I not of the House of Eorl? I have waited on faltering feet long enough."

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·202s | Faramir, Prince of Ithilien | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, choose an opponent. At the beginning of that player's next end step, you draw a card if they didn't attack you that turn. Otherwise, create three 1/1 white Human Soldier creature tokens.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·202s | Faramir, Prince of Ithilien | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The City was made more fair than it had ever been, even in the days of its first glory.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·203s | Flame of Anor | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Choose one. If you control a Wizard as you cast this spell, you may choose two instead. • Target player draws two cards. • Destroy target artifact. • Flame of Anor deals 5 damage to target creature.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·203s | Flame of Anor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There was a ringing clash and a stab of white fire, and the Balrog fell back.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·206s | Galadriel of Lothlórien | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever the Ring tempts you, if you chose a creature other than Galadriel of Lothlórien as your Ring-bearer, scry 3. Whenever you scry, you may reveal the top card of your library. If a land card is revealed this way, put it onto the battlefield tapped.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·206s | Galadriel of Lothlórien | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I pass the test. I will diminish, and go into the West, and remain Galadriel."

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·207s | Gandalf the Grey | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, choose one that hasn't been chosen — • You may tap or untap target permanent. • Gandalf the Grey deals 3 damage to each opponent. • Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy. • Put Gandalf on top of its owner's library.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·209s | Gimli, Mournful Avenger | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Gimli, Mournful Avenger has indestructible as long as two or more creatures died under your control this turn. Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Gimli. When this ability resolves for the third time this turn, Gimli fights up to one target creature you don't control.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·211s | King of the Oathbreakers | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying Whenever King of the Oathbreakers or another Spirit you control becomes the target of a spell, it phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until your next turn.) Whenever King of the Oathbreakers or another Spirit you control phases in, create a tapped 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·213s | Lotho, Corrupt Shirriff | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts their second spell each turn, you lose 1 life and create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·213s | Lotho, Corrupt Shirriff | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Whatever is wrong in the Shire, Lotho will be at the bottom of it: you can be sure of that."\n—Pippin

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·215s | Merry, Esquire of Rohan | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Haste Merry, Esquire of Rohan has first strike as long as it's equipped. Whenever you attack with Merry and another legendary creature, draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·215s | Merry, Esquire of Rohan | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Then suddenly Merry felt it at last, beyond doubt: a change. Wind was in his face!

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·218s | Pippin, Guard of the Citadel | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Vigilance, ward {1} {T}: Another target creature you control gains protection from the card type of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that type.)

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·218s | Pippin, Guard of the Citadel | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Here do I swear fealty to Gondor, until my lord release me, or death take me."

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·222s | Samwise Gamgee | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.") Sacrifice three Foods: Return target historic card from your graveyard to your hand. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·223s | Saruman of Many Colors | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Ward—Discard an enchantment, instant, or sorcery card. Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, each opponent mills two cards. When one or more cards are milled this way, exile target enchantment, instant, or sorcery card with equal or lesser mana value than that spell from an opponent's graveyard. Copy the exiled card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·224s | Sauron, the Dark Lord | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Ward—Sacrifice a legendary artifact or legendary creature. Whenever an opponent casts a spell, amass Orcs 1. Whenever an Army you control deals combat damage to a player, the Ring tempts you. Whenever the Ring tempts you, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw four cards.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·225s | Sauron's Ransom | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Choose an opponent. They look at the top four cards of your library and separate them into a face-down pile and a face-up pile. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard. The Ring tempts you.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·225s | Sauron's Ransom | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "He was dear to you, I see. And now he shall endure the slow torment of years."

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·228s | Shagrat, Loot Bearer | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever Shagrat, Loot Bearer attacks, attach up to one target Equipment to it. Then amass Orcs X, where X is the number of Equipment attached to Shagrat. (Control of the Equipment doesn't change. To amass Orcs X, put X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also an Orc. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token first.)

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·229s | Sharkey, Tyrant of the Shire | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Activated abilities of lands your opponents control can't be activated unless they're mana abilities. Sharkey, Tyrant of the Shire has all activated abilities of lands your opponents control except mana abilities. Mana of any type can be spent to activate Sharkey's abilities.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·230s | Shelob, Child of Ungoliant | Card Text
PLTR·231s | Sméagol, Helpful Guide | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died under your control this turn, the Ring tempts you. Whenever the Ring tempts you, target opponent reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card. Put that card onto the battlefield tapped under your control and the rest into their graveyard.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·234s | Tom Bombadil | Card Text
trans-unit.source: As long as there are four or more lore counters among Sagas you control, Tom Bombadil has hexproof and indestructible. Whenever the final chapter ability of a Saga you control resolves, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a Saga card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. This ability triggers only once each turn.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·236s | Andúril, Flame of the West | Card Text
PLTR·239s | Glamdring | Card Text
PLTR·240s | Horn of Gondor | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Horn of Gondor enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token. {3}, {T}: Create X 1/1 white Human Soldier creature tokens, where X is the number of Humans you control.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·241s | Horn of the Mark | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever two or more creatures you control attack a player, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·241s | Horn of the Mark | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "He that blows this horn shall set fear in the hearts of his enemies and joy in the hearts of his friends."\n—Éowyn

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·245s | Mithril Coat | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flash Indestructible When Mithril Coat enters the battlefield, attach it to target legendary creature you control. Equipped creature has indestructible. Equip {3}

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·246s | The One Ring | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Indestructible When The One Ring enters the battlefield, if you cast it, you gain protection from everything until your next turn. At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life for each burden counter on The One Ring. {T}: Put a burden counter on The One Ring, then draw a card for each burden counter on The One Ring.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·247s | Palantír of Orthanc | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, put an influence counter on Palantír of Orthanc and scry 2. Then target opponent may have you draw a card. If that player doesn't, you mill X cards, where X is the number of influence counters on Palantír of Orthanc, and that player loses life equal to the total mana value of those cards.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·248s | Phial of Galadriel | Card Text
trans-unit.source: If you would draw a card while you have no cards in hand, draw two cards instead. If you would gain life while you have 5 or less life, you gain twice that much life instead. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·248s | Phial of Galadriel | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "May it be a light to you in dark places, when all other lights go out."

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·250s | Sting, the Glinting Dagger | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has haste. At the beginning of each combat, untap equipped creature. Equipped creature has first strike as long as it's blocking or blocked by a Goblin or Orc. Equip {2}

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·253s | Barad-dûr | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Barad-dûr enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a legendary creature. {T}: Add {B}. {X}{X}{B}, {T}: Amass Orcs X. Activate only if a creature died this turn.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·253s | Barad-dûr | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Those who pass the gates of Barad-dûr do not return."\n—Gandalf

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·256s | Minas Tirith | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Minas Tirith enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a legendary creature. {T}: Add {W}. {1}{W}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you attacked with two or more creatures this turn.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·256s | Minas Tirith | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I would see the White Tree in flower again in the courts of the kings, and Minas Tirith in peace."\n—Faramir

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·257s | Mines of Moria | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Mines of Moria enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a legendary creature. {T}: Add {R}. {3}{R}, {T}, Exile three cards from your graveyard: Create two Treasure tokens.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·257s | Mines of Moria | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Moria! Moria! Wonder of the Northern world!"\n—Glóin

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·258s | Mount Doom | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {B} or {R}. {1}{B}{R}, {T}: Mount Doom deals 1 damage to each opponent. {5}{B}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Mount Doom and a legendary artifact: Choose up to two creatures, then destroy the rest. Activate only as a sorcery.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·259s | Rivendell | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Rivendell enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a legendary creature. {T}: Add {U}. {1}{U}, {T}: Scry 2. Activate only if you control a legendary creature.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·259s | Rivendell | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Were I to go where my heart dwells, I would now be wandering in the fair valley of Rivendell."\n—Aragorn

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·260s | The Shire | Card Text
trans-unit.source: The Shire enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a legendary creature. {T}: Add {G}. {1}{G}, {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Create a Food token.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·260s | The Shire | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You must start somewhere and have some roots, and the soil of the Shire is deep."\n—Merry

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·399s | Lobelia Sackville-Baggins | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flash Menace When Lobelia Sackville-Baggins enters the battlefield, exile target creature card from an opponent's graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn, then create X Treasure tokens, where X is the exiled card's power.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·400s | Wizard's Rockets | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Wizard's Rockets enters the battlefield tapped. {X}, {T}, Sacrifice Wizard's Rockets: Add X mana in any combination of colors. When Wizard's Rockets is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·401s | Gandalf, Friend of the Shire | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flash You may cast sorcery spells as though they had flash. Whenever the Ring tempts you, if you chose a creature other than Gandalf, Friend of the Shire as your Ring-bearer, draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·402s | Delighted Halfling | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a legendary spell, and that spell can't be countered.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·403s | Bilbo, Retired Burglar | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Bilbo, Retired Burglar enters or leaves the battlefield, the Ring tempts you. Whenever Bilbo deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token.

trans-unit.resname: PLTR·404s | Frodo Baggins | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever Frodo Baggins or another legendary creature enters the battlefield under your control, the Ring tempts you. As long as Frodo is your Ring-bearer, it must be blocked if able.
